name: WooCommerce Order Test
author: WP Fix It

sections.description:
WooCommerce Order Test provides a testing payment gateway for WooCommerce. It allows you to simulate a full checkout process on your site to confirm everything is running smoothly. The gateway is available for admin users only.

Easy setup and SUPER EASY testing!

Brought to you by WP Fix It
Back when we started our business in 2009, there were very few companies specializing in WordPress support. Most of the support was provided by freelancers who built WordPress sites.
* Resolved our first ticket in 2009
* Average resolve time: 30 minutes or less

Best Reasons to Use This

  • Quickly determine if your checkout is working correctly
  • Simulate a full checkout process without making an actual payment
sections.installation:
Install from the WP Dashboard
1. Log into your WP dashboard, then click Plugins > Add New
2. Under the “Install Plugins” title, click Upload
3. Choose the plugin zip file, upload, and activate the plugin.

Install from FTP
1. Extract the zip file and upload the contents to the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WP installation.
2. Activate the plugin from the Plugins page.

That’s It! You’re Done!
